Articles.Content:
I am not seeing anywhere to change or add flags to vehicles?

 I do not see my agency flag showing on any of my rockets.  I have a mission to plant a flag with a picture of a mare on it, but I cannot find any way to change the flags that would go on a ship or that you would plant on the ground.  I managed to plant a flag on the Mun, but it was my agency flag.  Right clicking or clicking the flag did not appear to give me options to change the flag.

Is it the "First Dibs" mission? Because that mission tells you to plant a flag in one of muns mares. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lunar_mare

Edited December 21, 2023 by Ghosty141

2 hours ago, Ghosty141 said:

Is it the "First Dibs" mission? Because that mission tells you to plant a flag in one of muns mares. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lunar_mare

  Um, yeah...guess I totally misread that.  LOL

I'd still like to know if it is possible to change flags in the game, whether on your craft or flags that are planted.
+1 here, I would like to display it on my rockets and set special flags for missions like we could in KSP-1. I assume it's still a soon™ feature.
